ModMetaData.name: Industrial tab go yeet
ModMetaData.author: White_Phant0m
ModMetaData.description: Patches PRF industrial tab contents to go over to VFE - Mechanoids factory tab. Made this since I use the lite version of PRF with VFE - Mechanoids and got annoyed by the logistics things being in a different tab. Should work with all RW versions since this is just a simple XML patch, dunno, didn't test others than 1.3
